content: this pattern is available for free on my website a printable ad-free version is for sale here on ravelry one skein of dk weight yarn and simple stitches are combined in this easy lightweight crochet cowl pattern the lacy crochet stitches make this cowl feel feminine and elegant you need to know basics of working in the round chains double crochets slip stitches i use us terminology finished cowl measures 8 5 in tall x 15 in wide laying flat yarn luna grey fiber arts zeta in the color araucana
